call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - April 17th

topics.title: Palm Token Multi-Chain Launch via Rosen Bridge
topics.summary: Palm token successfully launched multi-chain using Rosen Bridge, supporting both Binance Smart Chain and Cardano with working arbitrage between chains. Staking is operational on both sides with ISPO continuing on Cardano side.

topics.title: Dynamic Staking System Architecture and Features
topics.summary: Palm implements dynamic unlocked staking with 7-day epochs where tokens can be unstaked instantly without waiting periods. System includes APY/APR calculator and has already attracted 250 million palms staked worth approximately $300,000.

topics.title: Market Making and Liquidity Management Strategy
topics.summary: Token launch included proper market making with $350,000 liquidity on Cardano and $150,000 on Binance side, generating $150,000 daily volume. Professional approach differs from typical Ergo/Cardano project launches that don't implement market making.

topics.title: Palm DAO Cross-Chain Governance Architecture
topics.summary: Palm DAO will enable cross-chain governance using Rosen Bridge to aggregate votes from multiple chains into single execution layer, potentially on Ergo. Plans include legal incorporation in Japan for enforceable on-chain contracts with regulatory compliance.

topics.title: Ergo Miners Dashboard Launch and Features
topics.summary: Mark developed a new professional dashboard at ergominers.com for the Sigmanauts mining pool with significantly upgraded UI/UX. The dashboard rivals major mining pool interfaces and supports various mining scenarios including casual gaming setups.

topics.title: Colorado Springs 2025 Conference Planning
topics.summary: Ergo conference scheduled for October 10-12, 2025 in Colorado Springs with open-source planning via GitHub. Community members can contribute suggestions, sign up, and submit pull requests for collaborative event organization.

topics.title: Node 6.0 Development and RocksDB Performance
topics.summary: Kushti has Node 6.0 RC3 successfully syncing with mainnet and continues sub-blocks development. Node 5.125 with RocksDB shows significant performance improvements for mining wallets and smart contracts, reducing load times from seconds to near-instant.

topics.title: Ergo Integration Requirements for Palm Token
topics.summary: Palm tokens cannot be bridged to Ergo until equivalent staking functionality is built to maintain regulatory compliance across all supported chains. The team is expanding development resources and may publish technical requirements for community development.

topics.title: Kraken Listing Pathways and Requirements
topics.summary: Two potential Kraken listing paths identified: official route requiring increased wallet holders (currently 500 vs needed 10,000) for Rosen-ERG on Cardano, and unofficial $50,000 finder's fee option. Sigmanauts developing wallet holder growth strategies including faucets and promotions.

topics.title: Gaming Community Mining Outreach Strategy
topics.summary: Discussion on targeting gamers for mining during non-gaming hours using intermittent mining approaches. Proposal for gamifying mining through idle game mechanics where characters evolve based on mining contributions, with community artists ready to support development.
